title: Designer - Marketing Administrator
job_overview:
Marketing Administrator


A job board based in Malta (European Union) is hiring a full-time remote Marketing Administrator.

We’re a small, fast-growing team helping people find jobs – not so different from OnlineJobs.ph! We already have one amazing Filipino teaUpgrade to see actual infomber and are now looking for a second!

What You’ll Do:
- Create Designs
- Manage marketing efforts 
- social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
- Design simple, eye-catching posts using Canva or other tools
- Run email campaigns (BREVO) 
- Track results 
- Support small clients and help post jobs when needed

You will also help with operations when not working on marketing. This can include reaching out to clients via email, doing administration duties, and providing support for staff on leave.

What We’re Looking For
Strong English (written & spoken)

Good eye for design and content

Experience with Design, Canva, Meta, and email marketing tools

Reliable, organised, and proactive

FAST and Stable internet connection and good communication

Willingness to grow and take ownership of your role

What We Offer
Long-term, full-time remote work

Friendly team and great working culture

Opportunity to grow in both marketing and operations

Real responsibility – you won’t just assist, you’ll own the work

To Apply:
Send us your CV and a short note (or video!) about:

Your experience with marketing or admin

Why you think you’d be a great fit

A quick creative idea for promoting a job board online.

We’re excited to meet someone who’s creative, reliable, and ready to grow with us!
